snippet.title: SER Trailer 2024
snippet.description:
Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2937520/Sacred_Earth__Reverie/
Social Media: https://twitter.com/MirageV_
Press Kit: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1vXhPzj0jI2TnG9hLLojU7R6i8B1N3iqP?usp=drive_link

Sacred Earth - Reverie an RPG that combines Visual Novel presentation and story advancement with multiple endings based on player decision, alongside gameplay consisting of point and click elements, JRPG inspired combat, and some character advancement features.

The game stars Cain or Abelle, the selectable protagonist. Their story starts as they grow disillusioned and notice inconsistencies regarding the 'Great Conflict' with a being known as the Demon Queen. Thus spurring their personal journey across the countryside to find answers to the mysteries of the current day, as well as those of the past.
